snippet.title: Lets Play World of Guns: Gun Disassembly 77 - Dragunov Sniper Rifle (SVD)
snippet.description:
World of Guns: Gun Disassembly lets you delve into the inner workings of guns from the largest gears to the smallest screws

The program is as true and accurate as possible to the actual workings of its real-life counterpart. All guns are fully 3-d modeled including even the smallest parts. All guns can be fully taken apart an examined. Parts are usually assembled and disassembled in a logical order, but sometimes the order is determined by specific safety or mechanical limitations. 

The game also includes several non-guns including human skeletons, motorbikes, cars and more items to come. All these items share the same 3-D modeling as the rest of the game. Very well done and unique!

World of Guns: Gun Disassembly is free on steam so there is no reason not to check it out,
http://store.steampowered.com/app/262410/

The game is currently in development so there is a lot more content to be added and the game will continue to improve.

If you liked this video feel free to make a comment, give it a like, or subscribe.

If you feel there is anything I could have done better or would like to give me advice feel free to do so, I am always willing to improve.

Adblock Absolution: https://www.patreon.com/TheGreenLing
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheGreenLingYoutube?fref=ts
Twitter: https://twitter.com/thgreenling
Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/GreenLingYoutube
Join to interact with the community!
